Medis Medical Imaging (healthcare ai) is Medis Medical Imaging provides advanced, vendor-independent software for the quantitative analysis of cardiac images from CT, MRI, X-Ray, and Ultrasound. It is uniquely trusted by leading hospitals, core labs, and pharmaceutical companies for its 30+ years of scientific validation and its proprietary technologies like QFR (Quantitative Flow Ratio).. Users choose it for cardiac-imaging, medical-image-analysis, quantitative-cardiology.
